metadata.title: CVE-2020-6519 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Policy bypass in CSP in Google Chrome prior to 84.0.4147.89 allowed aremote attacker to bypass content security policy via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
